info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:50PM MST until July 30 at 12:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... East Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until midnight MST /midnight PDT/. * At 850 PM MST /850 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the Lake Mead Recreation Area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly and May impact Northshore Road and Temple Bar Roads. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Temple Bar Campground, Echo Bay Campground, Echo Bay, Callville Bay Campground, Callville Bay, Hoover Dam, South Cove, Meadview, Temple Bar and Willow Beach. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
